original_text: When he led them through the desert, they did not become thirsty. He broke open a rock for them, so that water poured out. They could drink as much as they needed. When he led them through the desert,
korean_text: 여호와께서 그들을 사막으로 통과하게 하시던 때에 그들이 목마르지 아니하게 하시되 그들을 위하여 바위에서 물이 흘러나게 하시며 바위를 쪼개사 물이 솟아나게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: When he led them through the desert
He broke open a rock for them
They could drink as much as they needed
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 필요한 만큼 마실 수 있었다
